answers.author: Victor Udoewa
answers.text:
Victor, we did not consider a naming convention specifically for training documents. Of the uploaded files, do you know which are training documents? Perhaps we can reconsider how to distinguish them from the others.

author: Victor Udoewa
text:
T&R Group,
What is the naming convention for documents related to training?
title: Training documents
